trans-unit.source: A trigger action that advances a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> to the end of its fill period.
trans-unit.target: Uma ação de gatilho que avança um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> até o final do período de preenchimento.

trans-unit.source: Use a SkipStoryboardToFill action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to advance a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> to its fill period, if it has one.
trans-unit.target: Usar uma ação de SkipStoryboardToFill com um <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>ou um <xref:System.Windows.Trigger>para avançar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>para seu período de preenchimento, se ele tiver um.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Trigger> </xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>

trans-unit.source: This action also advances all child <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> objects of the target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> to their fill periods, if they have them.
trans-unit.target: Essa ação também avança todos os filhos <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>objetos de destino <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>para os períodos de preenchimento, se eles existirem.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>

trans-unit.source: SkipStoryboardToFill only affects an active <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> (after the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> starts).
trans-unit.target: SkipStoryboardToFill afeta somente um ativo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>(após o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>inicia).</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Pausar, retomar, parar ou caso contrário, o controle um Storyboard interativamente a poderá pausar, retomar ou controlar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>interativamente, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>propriedade do seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>e usar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>objeto (como <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) controlá-lo fazendo referência a seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>não for especificado, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>não pode ser controlado interativamente depois que ele é iniciado.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [como: controlar um Storyboard após iniciar](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) para obter mais informações.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SkipStoryboardToFill"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SkipStoryboardToFill"> </xref> classe.
